page.description: Append one or more entries to the end of an array. Returns index of first appended entry.

argument.name: count
argument.description: The number of entries to append. Default value is 1.

page.discussion: The *[xb:.append()]* method for an xbasic array appends one or more empty entries to the end of the array. *[xb:.append()]* returns the index of the first entry created.
page.example:
dim arr[3] as c arr[1] = "apple" arr[2] = "banana" arr[3] = "orange"
dim index as n index = arr.append(2)
arr[index] = "pear" arr[index+1] = "mango"
? arr = [1] = "apple" [2] = "banana" [3] = "orange" [4] = "pear" [5] = "mango"
